alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:29PM EDT until July 05 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Felicity, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Higginsport and Feesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
